title: ExperienceEvent Campaign details
description: This mixin is used to capture campaign information related to an ExperienceEvent, including the channel ID, channel type, media type, and location type.

xdm:campaignID.title: Campaign ID
xdm:campaignID.description: Identifier of the marketing campaign to which activity originating this message belongs to.

xdm:campaignName.title: Campaign Internal Name
xdm:campaignName.description: A human-friendly identifier of the marketing campaign which is originating this message.

xdm:campaignOutboundMessage.title: Campaign Outbound Message
xdm:campaignOutboundMessage.description: Outbound Message attributes related to this campaign.

xdm:campaignMessageDelivery.title: Campaign Message Delivery
xdm:campaignMessageDelivery.description: Message delivery attributes related to this campaign.

xdm:campaignTrackingLink.title: Campaign Tracking Link
xdm:campaignTrackingLink.description: Tracking link attributes related to this campaign message.
